alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Butler; Clarion; Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Jefferson; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT MERCER...VENANGO...NORTHERN LAWRENCE... BUTLER...INDIANA...NORTHEASTERN ALLEGHENY...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON... WESTMORELAND...ARMSTRONG...CLARION AND EASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 558 PM EDT, snow showers were located along a line extending from Adamsville to near Sarver to 6 miles northeast of Delmont to near Lawson Heights to near Ursina. Movement was east at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Monroeville, New Castle, Greensburg, Hermitage, Sharon, Indiana, Butler, Oil City, Jeannette, Latrobe, Grove City, and Franklin. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 59 and 64, and between mile markers 75 and 100. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 92 and 138. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 1 and 70. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 12. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and worsening travel conditions. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this intense snow shower. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
